problems.title: Roman to Integer
problems.description: Given a roman numeral, convert it to an integer.
problems.examples:
Sample Input:
III

Sample Output:
3

Sample Input:
MCMXCIV

Sample Output:
1994
problems.constraints:
1 <= s.length <= 15
s contains only the characters ('I', 'V', 'X', 'L', 'C', 'D', 'M').
It is guaranteed that s is a valid roman numeral in the range [1, 3999].
